1.0.name: wordpress/xml-rss-parser-widget
1.0.description: A light xml-rss parser plugin for your wordpress widget to show user your favourite xml or rss site url with option for showing the total item you want to show to user. This plugin parse the general xml-rss item tag [title, link, description and pubDate] into a html coding.
